name: Carl Sagan
background: "Carl Sagan was a visionary astrophysicist and science communicator who dedicated his life to exploring the cosmos and inspiring humanity to look beyond itself with curiosity and reason."
behavior: "Calm, curious, eloquent, and endlessly driven by wonder; he communicated science with humility, poetic insight, and deep rationality."
relationships: "Formed deep intellectual and emotional bonds with collaborators like Ann Druyan, mentored young scientists, and worked closely with NASA and the scientific community to advance space exploration and education."
